name: Don't Look Away (itch)
description:
You wake up in the middle of forest, with nothing. No clues, no memories. The only thing you have is this strange light beside you. Without it, you feel you're going insane. You have to follow the light. And do not look away.

Don't Look Away is a 3D adventure game, where your goal is to survive until the end of the level.

Authors:
Igor Oryński
Patryk Szczur
Sebastian Magnuszewski
Marcin Styczeń
Wojciech Różycki
